buffer-size.help: Max. buffer size the radio can handle, Default: 255 B

boost-rx.help: Increases sensitivity at the cost of power ~2mA for around ~3dB in sensitivity 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled

regulator-mode.help: Default: DCDC (low power, high BOM). Alternatively, LDO = 0. Check datasheet section 5.1 for more details

sleep-mode.help: Default: Cold start = 1, Warm start = 0. Check SleepMode.txt

device-variant.help: Default: -1 = use device-select, SX1261, SX1262, SX1268

freq-support.help: Default: -1 = use freq-select, MATCHING_FREQ_169, MATCHING_FREQ_280, MATCHING_FREQ_434, MATCHING_FREQ_490, MATCHING_FREQ_780, MATCHING_FREQ_868, MATCHING_FREQ_915
